Package model

Class GameDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.GameDriver

  • public class GameDriver
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class does the following. A startup phase for setting up the map and players Adding and Allocating Initial Armies to Players Allocating random countries to players
    Author:
    Meet_Patel, Muhammad_Hamza_Noor, WaleedAhmad
